forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 40F. ESE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Thunder possible. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Thunder possible. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening turning to all snow overnight. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to snow showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
